pages.text: The $(mob)Swarm Spider$() is a variant of the $(l:minecraft_spider)$(mob)Spider$() found in $(thing)Hedge Mazes$(), $(thing)Hollow Hills$() and $(thing)Leaf Dungeons$(). Compared to normal $(l:minecraft_spider)$(mob)Spiders$(), it is much smaller, much weaker and remains hostile in light. Inside $(thing)Hedge Mazes$() it is capable of spawning even in broad daylight.
